item.description:
I thought I'd check out the trails near Parker's Maple Barn where I will be joining the Nashua French Meetup group for brunch.

An old railroad bed that runs from Towsend, MA to Wilton, NH through the town of Mason, NH. A flat, steady grade makes this trail great for trail running, mntn biking, snowshoeing, XC skiing and hiking for beginners or for athletes in training (more on trail description).

The trail intersects Depot Road about 3 miles from the Maple Barn and I thought we could start there and head north, up to Sand Pit Road or Russell Road. From the map it looks to be about 2 miles.

Carpooling may be recommended as I read that "Most of these intersections have room for just a couple cars"

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Mason, NH - Railroad Trail
